Method two overview

Example one

jQuery.promises.timer(
    // milliseconds
    500,

    // Success callback
    function(){
        alert("Success!");
    },

    // Fail callback
    function(){
        alert("Error!");
    }
);

Example two

var flag = window.flagBg;

jQuery.promises.timer(

    // milliseconds
    500,

    // Success callback
    function(){
        // Toggle body background-colour from yellow to green
        $output.css({
            backgroundColor: flag ?
                "#fff9a6" : "#aaffaa"
        });

        window.flagBg = !flag;
    },

    // Fail callback
    function(){
        alert("Error");
    }
);
